summary: Comprehensive testing of Continental Academy Node.js backend and React frontend - ALL 36 backend tests passed, frontend UI fully functional with excellent integration

issues: Site name shows 'TEST_Continental Academy' from previous test - reset to 'Continental Academy'
Discord support link uses placeholder URL 'https://discord.gg/placeholder'

passed_tests: Backend: Admin access denied for student
Frontend: Homepage loads with hero section
Frontend: Admin login successful with redirect to dashboard
Frontend: Admin panel accessible with all tabs
Frontend: Admin Overview tab with analytics
Frontend: Admin Users tab with user management
Frontend: Admin Courses tab with CRUD buttons
Frontend: Shop page with category filters
Frontend: User registration with confirm password
Frontend: Registration redirects to dashboard with success toast
action_items: Update Discord invite URL from placeholder 'https://discord.gg/placeholder' to actual Discord server link
seed_data_creation: Default admin and student users created automatically on server startup
context_for_next_testing_agent: Node.js/Express backend fully functional with MongoDB. All CRUD operations for programs, courses, lessons, shop products, FAQs, results, and settings working. Authentication with JWT tokens working. Admin panel fully functional. Previous iteration reported 520 errors on CREATE operations - these are now FIXED and all tests pass.
